description: Helpless and hog-tied, Officer Kirk Cummings tries to escape, but to no avail. Scott Demarco enters the room and observes the struggling pig on the floor, a wry smile crossing his face as he imagines what he is about to do. Using a fat dildo attached to the end of a long steel handle, Scott teasingly probes the angry cop's mouth. Becoming more aggressive, Scott pushes the dildo past Kirk's lips. Once the dildo is wet with spit, Scott presses it into Kirk's hole. After teasing Kirk's tight hole for a bit, Scott returns the dildo to Kirk's mouth, forcing him to taste himself. Pulling both of Kirk's legs up into the air, Scott ramps up his thrusting with the dildo, giving Kirk an intense lesson in submission.
title: Cops In Cuffs, Scene #03
